other_tests.findings: Lateralization ratio of 2, suggesting bilateral rather than unilateral aldosterone secretion, with the right adrenal gland secreting approximately twofold more aldosterone than the left.
Five different adrenocortical adenomas revealed by postsurgical analysis.
Detected various known somatic mutations, including KCNJ5 mutations (L168R and T158A) and a CACNA1D G403R somatic mutation.
Positive for CYP11B2 in all adenomas except one, weak positivity for CYP17A in some.
